title: Amphiphilic electrolyte additive as an ion-flow stabilizer enables superb zinc metal batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00318G, Paper
Zimin Yang, Yilun Sun, Siting Deng, Hao Tong, Mingqiang Wu, Xinbin Nie, Yifan Su, Guanjie He, Yinghe Zhang, Jianwei Li, Guoliang Chai
3-(Hydroxy(phenyl)phosphoryl)propanoic acid (HPA) has a strong coordination ability for Zn2+/metal anodes which not only form sphere micelles that promote the uniform transmission of Zn2+Â but also enhance the preferential adsorption on anodes.
